abilities.name: Warp-sighted Butcher
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll. If that unit is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

abilities.name: Trophy Taker
abilities.rule: Each time this model destroys an enemy **CHARACTER** model, you gain 1CP.
